channel.title: The perfect Base?
channel.description:
Hello, I am currently looking for the Perfect Base/Clean source to code. I'm tired of Leech coding diffrent sources, and I'm really up for a challange testing my skills. Since I have no experience with starting from basicly 0... I'm asking you what a good base is...? I will be grateful if you can link me to it.
Your sincerely.

item.title: The perfect Base?
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

I’d start learning with an Allstar or Delta base.

Read full topic

item.title: The perfect Base?
item.dc:creator: @pro_banana pro banana
item.description:
@pro_banana wrote:

[quote=“k0 twin, post:3, topic:374663”]This is why it’s kind of difficult to help you =/[quote author=pro banana link=topic=470622.msg3441520#msg3441520 date=1293114782]
I’m tired of Leech coding diffrent sources, and I’m really up for a challange testing my skills.
[/quote]
I would suggest Hyperion.

Since I have no experience with starting from basicly 0…

But you have no experience, so at the same time I don’t want to recommend Hyperion. You’re first goal should be learning the basics of programming, and then expanding from there. Don’t start off with a giant project without any knowledge of the subject. You’ll just be making you’re life harder than it needs to be.[/quote]

I have general Java programming skills, but it’s true I have never tried something this big.
And I guess there aren’t any guidelines for this.

Read full topic

item.title: The perfect Base?
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

This is why it’s kind of difficult to help you =/[quote=“pro banana, post:1, topic:374663”]I’m tired of Leech coding diffrent sources, and I’m really up for a challange testing my skills.[/quote]
I would suggest Hyperion.

pro banana:

Since I have no experience with starting from basicly 0…

But you have no experience, so at the same time I don’t want to recommend Hyperion. You’re first goal should be learning the basics of programming, and then expanding from there. Don’t start off with a giant project without any knowledge of the subject. You’ll just be making you’re life harder than it needs to be.

Read full topic

item.title: The perfect Base?
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Jay Sir Jay
item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

Idk m8, not easy to get that anymore with all this custom shit people create today… My ideal server is an old rs2 style server xD
